price: 87. Kaadu nabiyow a-koros sin kee isin taqbudeenim iyyi ginee axcuk ken essertek, inkih Yalli nee gine axce- lon. Toysa Yallih qibaadak mannal makkootaanaah agleyta Kaat haanamal?
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqahum layaqūlunna al-lahu fa-annā yu'fakūna
